alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, central Columbia and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to near Wellborn. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Taylor, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia
